patterns: My Ads page not loading - Chrome
responses:
Disable any adblockers you have installed on your current web browser.
Perform a cache clear – please make sure to select the option to remove “Cookies and other site data” .The steps to perform a cache clear can be found here.
Manually remove the .html text from https://www.gumtree.co.za/my/ads.html.
Use an alternative web browser (Firefox or Microsoft Edge)

patterns: I Forgot My Password - Can You Reset It?
responses: If you forgot your password, click the "Forgot your password?" link on the sign in page to have your password emailed to you.

patterns: How Do I Change My Email Address?
responses: For security reasons, please contact our support team who will be able to assist in changing the email address associated with your Gumtree account.

If you are not receiving any replies to your ads, you can try the following:
If you are using the Gumtree website from a work environment, please make sure that your firewall settings allow messages sent through Gumtree
Check your spam/trash folders for any replies
If you are still experiencing problems after trying the above, type - TALK TO AGENT

patterns: Why Have I Not Received a Posting Confirmation Email?
responses:
If you haven't received a posting confirmation email, please check any "Spam" or "Junk" email folders to see if it was sent there.
Ensure that southafrica@gumtree.co.za and noreply@gumtree.co.za is added to your email "safe list".
Ensure that you're posting from a local area connection, and not whilst connected to a VPN or proxy network
Before retrying to upload your ad, make sure you clear all your browser saved data
Try an alternative web browser and see if the problem persists
Make sure your pop-up blocker is switched off
Check that you don’t have any additional web browser extensions that may be causing issues (e.g Ad blockers) running in your web browser
Enable your web browser's cookies

patterns: How Can I Include Images in My Ad?
responses:
On the posting or editing page, you should see a section called "Pictures" (right below the description box).
Click on one of the picture frames to upload images.
Select a picture file from your computer's hard disk and click "OK". The picture will then be uploaded and attached to your ad.You can upload multiple images with one action by holding down CTRL when selecting your images from your computer.

You can add up to 12 pictures from the Gumtree desktop website and 8 images from the iOS/Android app. Remember a good picture is worth a thousand words, so including one or more with your Ad will increase your chance of getting several replies. (It's recommended that you avoid using web/stock/copyright images to represent your goods).
Our agents are all busy, You will be directed to one when they become available
Your chatting to Stacey, How may i help you

patterns: How Do I Suggest a New City Be Added to Gumtree?
responses:
To ask that a new Gumtree site be offered for your city, please reach out to us at our helpdesk, select a topic and click on the "I need to contact support" link located at the bottom of our help pages and create a case.
 
We create Gumtree sites based on demand from the community. In the meantime, we encourage you to use Gumtree in the city nearest to you.

Registering is easy and only takes a few steps. 1. Enter your email address you want to register. 2. Create a password. 3. Enter a Profile name so that users can identify you. 4. Check your email inbox for the confirmation email. 5. Login and begin your Gumtree journey!

Posting an ad on Gumtree is totally free and it couldn’t be easier thanks to this handy step-by-step guide. 1: Enter your Ad title, make it specific to give buyer a clear indication as to what you are selling. 2: Select the most appropriate category for your item. 3: Add your images. You can add up to 12 images!. 4: Complete all the necessary fields to make your ad more descriptive.

patterns: Selecting Your Location When Posting an Ad
responses: You can use our location selector to select the area closest to your location. Once you select a province option, you will be given town options to choose from:
A second selection option is to use your GPS location to determine where to post your ad. Make sure you Location is enable on your device

patterns: How to Manage Your Cookies on Gumtree
responses:
When you visit or interact with our sites, services, applications, tools or messaging, we or our authorised service providers may use cookies, web beacons, and other similar technologies for storing information to help provide you with a better, faster, and safer experience and for advertising purposes. For more information on Gumtree’s Cookie Policy, please click here. 

We understand that you may want to manage the level of cookie information that is stored on your device, and so we created this page to help you do so. (Please note: the links below will take you to external websites, and the terms and conditions and privacy policies of those websites’ owners, not Gumtree, will govern your use of those sites.).
